ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Looking for Xakra Bile & rockhopper blood
ygData.msgSnippet: The blood drenched hopling drops a serrated needle claw that is a good newb 1hs weapon.  if you go here http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=7719
ygData.messageBody:
The blood drenched hopling drops a serrated needle claw that is a good newb 1hs weapon.  if you go here http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/search.shtml?id=7719  there is a picture of the hopling...  complete with a picture of my darling little girl on the picture.  (Rakshaka is my in game husband,  RL boyfriend)

Toni (aka Katashaka 40 shaman)

  Su <suceress@...> wrote:


I think I've seen a blood-drenched hopper or somethign like that. It's red
and not hard to miss. Can't rightly remember if that's the mob that drops
it. I think the regular hoppers out in shadeweaver drop it though.
luv,
-Su


> Thanks for the suggestions for the bile & blood.  I'll definitely try
> Shadeweaver's for the blood.  What hoppers do they drop off of? Or just
> the Young Rockhoppers?
>
> Kill the beetles for the worms, and the scorpions for the hoppers huh?
> I'll try it.
>
> Thanks!
> Vicky/Ariaya
